oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Your United Nations - Episode #09 "Disarmament" - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC radio program Your United Nations, episode 9 "Disarmament", part 2. Originally broadcast 1946-12-03. Cast include Frank Papp (director), Jack C. Wilson (writer), Jack Costello (announcer), Alexander Scourby (narrator), and Andrew Cordier (guest speaker). Organist may be George Wright, based on researcher contact.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; NBC University of the Air; Your United Nations (Radio program); American Association for the United Nations; WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Cordier, Andrew W. (Andrew Wellington), 1901-1975; Wilson, Jack C.; Scourby, Alexander, 1913-1985; Papp, Frank, 1909-1996; Costello, Jack, 1908-1983; WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Wright, George (organist);
